title: Spaceman1000$
author: Spaceman1000$
content: Why does celebrity divorce happen so frequently in our today's society?we have realized that a significant portion of celebrity marriages fail. This is the inquiry that has been posed by numerous individuals in the past. Some people think that living the life of a celebrity gives one a stronger sense of control. Some people also think that it is harder to develop sincerity because of the celebrity way of life. Some also think that the celebrity lifestyle is a byproduct of capitalism, some also argues that infidelity might be a major factor as to why celebrity couples marriages don't last.

comments.author: paxmao
comments.body: Not specifically celebrities, divorce is quite frequent in countries where it is allowed and more or less hassle free. The reasons for Celebs are a bit different, since for most of the cases it is due to any of the following:- Cheating, frequently.- People marry too young and realize it has been a mistake. Incompatibility.- Addictions or money problems, sometimes stress.- People decide to follow different life options or paths.For celebs... divorce does not mean much. Usually the economic side is not important so they feel free to go.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: But this is not limited to celebrities only. Divorce is a common phenomenon in all societies with different cultures. Almost every one of them has a relative who is in a state of divorce. In the end, marriage is a circumstantial decision that can be undone.Celebrities are more susceptible to temptations, including the ease of changing partners. In addition, the goals of the marriage contract differ from one person to another. This does not mean that there are no successful marriage relationships.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I think the fact that their marriages or relationships are not as private as most people are is one of the fueling factors. Imagine being in a marriage where the media keeps poking into each and every detail of it. The pressure alone makes both partners to let it go.Also, money or wealth has played a very big role in degrading the moral standards of people today. In societies where one of the partners stands to gain properties and money she didn't even work hard for after a divorce, then it is quite obvious incidences of divorce will only increase, often triggered by the people who feel they will gain so much from them.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Spaceman1000$ on January 06, 2023, 09:20:56 PMWhy does celebrity divorce happen so frequently in our today's society?we have realized that a significant portion of celebrity marriages fail. This is the inquiry that has been posed by numerous individuals in the past. Some people think that living the life of a celebrity gives one a stronger sense of control. Some people also think that it is harder to develop sincerity because of the celebrity way of life. Some also think that the celebrity lifestyle is a byproduct of capitalism, some also argues that infidelity might be a major factor as to why celebrity couples marriages don't last.The increase in the fall of many marriages in our societies is because of the decline in the application of some important virtues. Patience, tolerance, love, meekness, etc are disappearing gradually from our societies. Love has been replaced with lust and pride has taken the place of meekness. This is clear proof that money and fame don't sustain a marriage. The increase in divorce Is not just a problem for celebrities, divorce has also increased in our society. This problem that these celebrities created has been copied by people globally because most people see these celebrities as their role models and follow them to divorce their spouses. Other factors that have contributed to the increase in divorce are improved women's rights, globalization, and social media.

comments.body: You make a good point about celebrity marriages, but not all the celebrities but the reason why some celebrities married don't last is because some celebrities don't wed for the sake of being husband and wife; instead, they wed for various reasons like running in the same public social circles or having affairs with one another that lead to marriage but ended in divorce; additionally, some celebrities' eyes weren't in one person like we some men our own is the worst because if a man is a celebrity, then his own is the worst and some of the wife can't take that and that also causes divorce to some celebrities marriage.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: The divorce rate is anywhere from 50-60%. The majority of people that get married end up getting divorced so it might be that celebrities aren't actually divorcing each other at a higher rate than everyone else.People in the religious communities have lower divorce rates, ie orthodox jews have significantly lower divorce rates than the general population and are among the most religious -- similar cultural values usually end up in a happier marriage. How many celebrities are getting married based on similar cultural values?It's one of the downsides in todays world where seemingly values are eroding.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Celebs are famous and have money this burst into their head that they feel that they can't be tied down to their spouse,because work is place first and they move about from one place to the other seeing admirers everywhere, this will lead them into cheating on their spouse and been deceived by their fans.Loyalty is another problem,when in marriage both partner  are loyal to one another,the marriage will last because loyalty brings respect. In our world today because there is no much love from married couples,loyalty plays a better role to preserve our marriages. Divorce in these our present days is something normal that must be looked into.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Celebrity lifestyle is one life pattern that's hard to keep up with when marriage is attached, owing to such things as:• Not having regular time together as couples due to events to catch up with (pleasing fans against spouse).• No submissiveness from wife in most cases ( two captains in a ship can't work).•A later understanding that it was a mistake marrying the person after some time.• Also,  when there's a lack of understanding of what marriage means other than just a social contract, which is more than that.These days divorce is not just about celebrities alone but normal people in the society and it's really killing the true purpose of marriage and most times it's the children that bears the consequences of these actions.

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: The celebrity lifestyle has ended up lots of marriages , I mean fresh and tender marriages. Being a celebrity is a kind of lifestyle that you will be open to everyone,  and their wont be enough spend with partners. Because of all this their is always trust issues in the marriage. When a marriage lacks trust it ends up in divorce.  Marriage is a commitment between two people who needs to spend time with each other, to know what is going on between each other. When all this are not their in marriage, it is impossible for marriage to last forever.  Celebrity who understands what marriage is all about handle their marriage well and it has always work for them.

comments.body: I think celebrity marriages are often challenged by themselves, celebrity egos are always provided psychology, they are always right, number one…but family life doesn't need those things.  .  Family life and marriage are based more on understanding, sympathy and yielding to each other.  But not all famous couples have marital problems.  It's a pity for Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie, but Victoria - Beckham is a proof that celebrity love is still beautiful.

comments.body: Not all celebrity marriages end in divorce; rather, the majority do so because the husband or wife has been having extramarital affairs to the point where they can no longer bear it. However, some celebrity marriages do show that they have a mutual understanding of one another by setting ground rules and guidelines before getting married, and as a result, their home will be peaceful.

comments.author: Cecilia Joytwin
comments.body: Celebrities frequently pursue occupations that require them to travel, which might strain their relationship with their primary partner.Working with attractive co-stars or other attractive persons is common for celebrities. When they are acting, they may be urged to act romantically toward that partner, and sometimes that involvement may extend off-screen.There are numerous chances for infidelity. There are a lot of people that wish to be romantically involved with celebrities at any one time since many people believe them to be desirable.

comments.author: Wolfblood200$
comments.body: From my point of view  ,I will say that most celebrity marriages are founded on the basis of getting more relevance in the eyes of the public  , it is more like a collaboration or a contract to enhance or grow one's reputation or popularity ,The ecstasy or euphoria of the union would be there in the early stages of the marriage but in most cases will fade as time goes by because the marriage wasn't formed on core marriage values, Marriage is beyond feelings or agreement  , marriage is seeing your spouse as an extension of yourself , and for that reason you'll do everything to grow and better the union which will benefits the pair of youCelebrity marriages fail because the home was not separated from the industry
